quiz.title: Color Personality Leadership Assessment
quiz.description: Discover your leadership style based on color personality traits

questions.question: When starting a new project, what's your first priority?
choices: Creating detailed plans and analyzing risks
Getting the team excited and brainstorming ideas
Setting clear goals and taking immediate action
questions.correctAnswer: Creating detailed plans and analyzing risks
questions.explanation: Blue leaders prioritize careful planning and analysis

questions.question: How do you handle team meetings?
choices: Follow structured agendas and take detailed notes
Keep it fun and encourage creative discussions
Focus on results and quick decision-making
Ensure everyone feels heard and valued
questions.correctAnswer: Keep it fun and encourage creative discussions
questions.explanation: Yellow leaders excel at creating positive, collaborative environments

questions.question: When facing a project crisis, you typically:
choices: Analyze data to find the root cause
Rally the team's spirit and optimism
Take charge and make quick decisions
Listen to everyone's concerns before acting
questions.correctAnswer: Take charge and make quick decisions
questions.explanation: Red leaders are action-oriented and decisive in crisis

questions.question: Your preferred approach to team feedback is:
questions.explanation: Green leaders focus on supportive, harmonious communication

questions.question: What motivates you most in leadership?
questions.explanation: Red leaders are motivated by achievement and results

questions.question: Your approach to project planning involves:
questions.explanation: Blue leaders excel at methodical planning and organization

questions.question: When dealing with project changes, you prefer to:
choices: Document and analyze the impact thoroughly
See it as an opportunity for innovation
Make quick adjustments and move forward
Ensure the team feels comfortable with changes
questions.correctAnswer: Document and analyze the impact thoroughly
questions.explanation: Blue leaders prioritize thorough analysis of changes

questions.question: Your preferred method of conflict resolution is:
choices: Analyzing facts and finding logical solutions
Taking decisive action to resolve quickly
questions.explanation: Yellow leaders seek innovative solutions that benefit all

questions.question: In team development, you focus most on:
questions.explanation: Green leaders prioritize team wellbeing and support

questions.question: When implementing new technologies, you typically:
questions.explanation: Yellow leaders embrace change with optimism
